public class Kdistance {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Kdistance thekd=new Kdistance();
		String input="";
		System.out.println(thekd.getnewString(input.toCharArray(), 2));

	}
	public String getnewString(char[] input,int k) {
		TreeMap<Character,Integer> themap=new TreeMap<Character,Integer>();
		int[] letters=new int[26];
		Arrays.fill(letters, 0);
		for(char x: input) {
			letters[x-'a']++;
		}
		for(int i=0; i<26; i++) {
			if (letters[i]!=0) {
				char theinput=(char) ('a'+i);
				themap.put( theinput, letters[i]);
			}
		}
		char[] res=new char[input.length];
		Arrays.fill(res, '+');
		while(!themap.isEmpty()) {
			java.util.Map.Entry<Character, Integer> curr=themap.pollLastEntry();
			int num=curr.getValue();
			char thechar=curr.getKey();
			int start=0;
			while(res[start]!='+') {
				start++;
				if(start==input.length) return "";
			}
			for(int i=1; i<=num; i++) {
				if(start>=input.length) return "";
				res[start]=thechar;
				start+=k+1;
			}
		}
		
		
		return String.valueOf(res);
	}

}
